head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MORIARTY, KATHLEEN SHINE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MORIARTY, KATHLEEN SHINE

block.p: MORIARTY--Kathleen Shine, on March 4th, 2005. Beloved wife of Michael. Cherished mother of Julia and John. Devoted sister of Stephen Shine. Also survived by a large extended family and numerous loving friends. The family will receive friends Sunday, 7-9 PM, at the Williams Funeral Home, 5628 Broadway at W. 232 St., Bronx, NY. Memorial Mass Monday, 10 AM, Good Shepherd Church. Inurnment Gate of Heaven Cemetery.
